title: Spicy chicken thighs with cucumber and cashew salad
description: This hot chicken and cool noodle salad combines bright lime and chilli flavours to spice up a summer lunch.Each serving provides 544kcal, 42g protein, 60g carbohydrate (of which 17g sugars), 15g fat (of which 3g saturates), 3g fibre and 3.3g salt.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper, to taste
8 chicken thighs, bone and skin removed
